body:
File Not Found is not the problem. Look at these lines:

> Upscaling Progress:   0%|                             | 0/3361 [00:01<?, ?it/s]?
> ???????????????
> Exception in thread 0:

`waifu2x-caffe` failed to execute and printed an error, but it's printed in Japanese encoding, and your terminal isn't able to decode this codec. Without the actual error message itself, I'm still not sure what's wrong.

Try changing the code page to UTF-8 before running the script:

```bash
chcp 65001
```

Tried several times with these instructions, but I only get no error message between the progress bar and "Exeption in thread 0" instead of ???????????????.
